import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import {loadFirebase} from '../lib/db.js' export default class Index extends React.Component{ componentDidMount(){ const script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = "/js/scripts.js"; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); const script1 = document.createElement("script"); script1.src = "/assets/demo/datatables-demo.js"; script1.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script1); } constructor (props){ super(props) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } state = { edit_id : '', delete_id : '', Jname:'', J_tel:'', J_min_salary:'', J_max_salary:'', J_hours:'', J_email:'', J_city:'', J_area:'', J_Working_Day:'', J_Qualification:'', J_JpLevel:'', J_Description:'', J_Contract:'', J_Address:'' } static async getInitialProps() { let firebase = await loadFirebase() let result = await new Promise((resolve, reject) => { firebase.firestore().collection('job') .limit(10) .get() .then(snapshot => { let data = [] snapshot.forEach((doc) => { data.push( Object.assign({ id: doc.id }, doc.data()) ) }) console.log("Hello") console.log(data) resolve(data) }) .catch(error => { reject([]) }) }) console.log(result) return {job: result} } deletePassId = (id)=>{ $("#deleteConfirmModal").modal('show'); this.setState({delete_id : id}) console.log(this.state.delete_id) } viewPassId = (id) => { this.setState({edit_id : id}) let firebase = loadFirebase() let data = {} try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job').doc(id).get(). then((snapshot)=>{ data = snapshot.data() console.log(data) this.setState ({ Jname:data.Jname, J_Contract:data.J_Contract, J_min_salary:data.J_min_salary, J_max_salary:data.J_max_salary, J_hours:data.J_hours, J_Working_Day:data.J_Working_Day, J_JpLevel:data.J_JpLevel, J_tel:data.J_tel, J_email:data.J_email, J_area:data.J_area, J_city:data.J_city, J_Address:data.J_Address, J_Description:data.J_Description, J_Qualification:data.J_Qualification }) }) console.log("getting data") console.log(this.state.Jname) }catch(error){ console.log(error) } console.log(this.state.Jname) $("#viewModal").modal('show') } editPassId = (id) => { this.setState({edit_id : id}) let firebase = loadFirebase() let data = {} try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job').doc(id).get() .then((snapshot)=>{ data = snapshot.data() console.log(data) this.setState ({ Jname:data.Jname, J_Contract:data.J_Contract, J_min_salary:data.J_min_salary, J_max_salary:data.J_max_salary, J_hours:data.J_hours, J_Working_Day:data.J_Working_Day, J_JpLevel:data.J_JpLevel, J_tel:data.J_tel, J_email:data.J_email, J_area:data.J_area, J_city:data.J_city, J_Address:data.J_Address, J_Description:data.J_Description, J_Qualification:data.J_Qualification }) }) console.log("getting data") console.log(this.state.jobName) }catch(error){ console.log(error) } console.log(this.state.jobName) $("#editModal").modal('show') } updateJob = () =>{ let firebase = loadFirebase() try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job').doc(this.state.edit_id).update({ Jname:data.Jname, J_Contract:data.J_Contract, J_min_salary:data.J_min_salary, J_max_salary:data.J_max_salary, J_hours:data.J_hours, J_Working_Day:data.J_Working_Day, J_JpLevel:data.J_JpLevel, J_tel:data.J_tel, J_email:data.J_email, J_area:data.J_area, J_city:data.J_city, J_Address:data.J_Address, J_Description:data.J_Description, J_Qualification:data.J_Qualification }) }catch(error){ console.log(error) } } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({[event.target.name] : event.target.value}) } deleteJob = () => { let firebase = loadFirebase() try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job') .doc(this.state.delete_id) .delete() console.log("Delete successful") }catch(error){ console.log(error) } } render(){ const job= this.props.job return(

{Job.Jname} {Job.J_Contract} {Job.J_min_salary}~{Job.J_max_salary} {Job.J_area} {Job.J_city} 2011/04/25 this.viewPassId(Job.id)} className="view material-icons icon-padding" title="View" style={{color: "rgb(0, 110, 255)", cursor:"pointer"}} data-dismiss="modal" data-toggle="tooltip">      this.deletePassId(Job.id)} className="delete material-icons icon-padding" title="Delete" style={{color: "red", cursor:"pointer"}} data-dismiss="modal">  

Detail Information

  • Job Name: {this.state.Jname}
  • Phone Number: {this.state.J_tel}
  • Email: {this.state.J_email}
  • Address: {this.state.J_Address}, {this.state.J_city}, {this.state.J_area}
  • Employment Status: {this.state.J_Contract}
  • Salary: {this.state.J_min_salary}~{this.state.J_max_salary} Yen
  • Working Days: {this.state.J_Working_Day} Days per Week
  • Working Hours:{this.state.J_hours}
  • Minimum Japanese Skill: {this.state.J_JpLevel}
  • Job Description: {this.state.J_Description}
  • Job Qualification: {this.state.J_Qualification}
